analysis: The project is a web-based interactive site focused on black holes, with existing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. The current theme needs to be enhanced with a dark, cosmic aesthetic, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The JavaScript file requires completion to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality. The CSS file needs to be updated to include the full intended dark, cosmic theme with animations. The HTML file needs to be completed to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.
